about_the_game:
John Nelson Brainner Stravinsky, alias "Goody", is the descendant of a very noble lineage and, only by accidental vicissitudes of life, finds himself in the painful obligation of dedicating himself to the no less noble "art" of the theft of other people's property. Goody is continually pursued by the implacable police officer Rodriguez, who, knowing of his wanderings, continually tries, with all the means at his disposal, to put him behind bars, which would bring him a prized promotion in the ranks.

But it is not only Officer Rodriguez who is interested in finding Goody, but also "Charly el Bardeos", an envious Christmas man, is constantly trying to bump into Goody in order to "clean him out" and thus prevent Goody from making his Big Score.

Now Goody has a good plan to get out of this bitch of a life for good. It will be the Ultimate Strike, never to strike again: The Big Bank Heist.

short_description: Goody, the original SPECTRUM action, platform and puzzle game from the eighties, puts you in the shoes of an expert bank robber in an updated version for Steam with improvements such as saving, filters and screen settings and achievements with the best Spanish hits.
